headline: Chubb Appoints John Latter to Lead Claims for Overseas General Insurance
summary: Chubb has announced the appointment of John Latter to lead Claims for Chubb Overseas General (COG), effective immediately.

raw.summary: Chubb has announced the appointment of John Latter to lead Claims for Chubb Overseas General (COG), effective immediately.

headline: Growth At A Discount: Chubb Limited's Stock Opportunity
summary: Chubb's innovative insurance portfolio, free from competition, allows for higher premiums and margins. Read why I feel CB stock is undervalued.
